item.title: About
item.description: What am I fascinated by now? Ritual / Culture Design [The Power of Ritual] (https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/46258506-the-power-of-ritual) by Casper ter Kuile. Conscious Evolution [Consious Evolution] (https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/183673.Conscious_Evolution) by Barbara Marx Hubbard Where am I? Berlin, Germany Home CODE Forest What do I care? building up on a movement [Convivial Earth] (https://cvvl.earth)
